scripts.clean: if [ -d _site ]; then trash docs; fi && npx @11ty/eleventy --serve
scripts.test-prod: ELEVENTY_ENV=prod node youtube-refresh.js && node convert-webp.js && node generate-favicon.js && npx @11ty/eleventy
scripts.prod: node youtube-refresh.js && node convert-webp.js && node generate-favicon.js && npx @11ty/eleventy
